question: You work for an international company, and would like to spend six months working in its head office in another country.Write a letter to your manager. In your letter:• explain why you want to work in the company’s head office for six months• say how your work could be done while you are away• ask for his/her help in arranging itWrite at least 150 words.
text: A very good day to you. I, am Prabhjot Singh, Senior Technical Assistant, Infosys, New Delhi Branch, India.  I am writing this letter to get your approval for work in Dubai Branch for the next six months. There is a strong reason for the same as I would get training in cloud computing over there which is very much essential for promotion channels.

As a new promotion policy is being introduced for employees to get higher positions in the company last week. I do not want to miss this opportunity as I am fulfilling all the criteria just missing six months of advanced training for a particular course. This training would be very helpful for my promotion.

This is for your kind information that while I am in Dubai, my work will be continued over there. I have installed all the required software on my personal laptop. I would continue all work during the tenure of this 6 months session.
I shall be very thankful to you If you provide me with an approval letter to join the Dubai  Branch next coming week.
